tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_conservation_regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulation_description TEXT,
  compliance_requirements VARCHAR(255),
  enforcement_agency VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE WaterRegulations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
  regulation_description TEXT,
  compliance_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_id INT,
  company_name VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  last_checked TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE water_regulations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    enforcement_agency VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    compliance_deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE businesses (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    industry_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    business_id INT NOT NULL,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    findings TEXT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE penalties (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT NOT NULL,
    fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    penalty_description TEXT,
    payment_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
